meta.title: Javelin AI - AI Solutions for Icelandic Companies
meta.description: Javelin provides education, consulting, and AI projects. We guide companies through their AI journey from the first step.

consent.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

um-okkur.title: About Us
um-okkur.description: Javelin specializes in helping companies utilize artificial intelligence. We don't reinvent the wheel, but rather help companies leverage the best available solutions.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.description: To empower companies with the latest AI technology and enable them to gain a competitive edge in their field.

sverrir.name: Sverrir Heiðar Davíðsson
sverrir.description: Sverrir Heiðar Davíðsson is a software engineer and until recently worked as a leader in the application of artificial intelligence at Orkuveitan. Sverrir has an M.Sc. in artificial intelligence and data science from DTU and a B.Sc. in software engineering from the University of Iceland. He has half a decade of experience with artificial intelligence. Sverrir has taught courses and given lectures on the application of artificial intelligence at Endurmenntun and numerous companies since 2023.

steve.name: Steve Andersen
steve.description: Steve is an experienced entrepreneur with a passion for using technology to empower entrepreneurs and businesses worldwide. He has founded and served on the board of numerous companies, including Amplify Communications Group and JourneyTeam. He has decades of experience in management, marketing, strategy, and has helped many companies and entrepreneurs grow through various stages of development.

petur.name: Pétur Már Sigurðsson
petur.description: Pétur Már Sigurðsson works as a specialist in AI implementation. Pétur has extensive experience as a programmer and CTO, handling diverse projects in consulting, education, implementation, and development of various AI solutions.

step1.title: AI Literacy
step1.description: The first and most important step is building a solid foundation of knowledge among staff.

step2.title: Opportunity Analysis
step2.description: We map current processes and identify opportunities for improvement using AI.

step3.title: Implementation
step3.description: We assist with implementing selected solutions, whether training on existing solutions or developing custom solutions.

courses.title: Courses
courses.description: Comprehensive and practical AI courses for employees and managers

lectures.title: Lectures
lectures.description: Interesting and informative lectures on the latest tools and developments in AI

strategic.title: Strategic Consulting
strategic.description: Comprehensive consulting for the company's future vision in AI

project.title: Project-based Consulting
project.description: Consulting for specific projects, staff, or challenges

custom.title: Specialized Assistance
custom.description: Get specialized assistance in implementing new AI solutions

customized.title: Customized Solutions
customized.description: Have solutions tailored to your environment and challenges

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: We look forward to hearing from you. Get in touch for inquiries or to discuss collaboration:
